name: Astronomancer
description:
You are the royal astronomancer. While your people know the stars and watch them, you have learned to listen to them as well. You are tasked to find out what they have to say that could help your people and your Queen.

This is a tiny "doodle" game, where I focused more on getting it done than polishing it, and it should be playable in under 5 mintues!

There are no time limits or quick reflexes needed for this game. Sound is optional.

The game was not optimized for mobile devices but should be playable.

It's one of "Eric's Mini Games", where I will try to do this more frequently.

Content information

This game is licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License"), and CC0.

It includes these works:

  • Star background: "M45, The Pleiades (Seven Sisters)", by Dylan O'Donnell 
  • Stone buildings image: by Diego Delso, delso.photo, License CC-BY-SA
  • Scroll button: by Endymian

Game was created using Godot Engine v3.2.2

Source code is at https://github.com/epw/astronomancer
